response.original_title: Dear Jeeva: An Unconditional Love Story
response.overview: Jeeva,a next-door guy who is seeking a job and living alone and Ms Jeeva is a focused workaholic. When they met for an interview, they began to like each other and fell in love.After a lot of emotional journey, both got married and started their lives happily. However, after a few months of marriage, Jeeva lost his job. Mrs. Jeeva received an onsite opportunity simultaneously.Ego starts to build between them and at one point Mrs. Jeeva wants to distance herself from him, but The news of Covid-lockdown has left them with no choice but to stay together.The rest of the story is about how situations during the lockdown helped them understand each other, whether they separated or accepted each other.
response.title: Dear Jeeva: An Unconditional Love Story
